column4: I have 2 internet conections one wan other lan how can I use both at the same time, so let's say I have a website and I want to use upload from both of them
if it is indeed a web sever, you just need to look up ip based virtual hosting with your prefered web server
ah that is very nice
but I don't understand it
are all the lights on on the modem? those modems are bridges
some isps have firmware that firewalls you from snmp/the web status page if some unknown things happen
that modem page I cant even open
keyUp paste the output of route -n to a pastebin
you're using dhcp right? not static config?
i havent changed anything in automatic eth conection when i con to eth it make connectio automatically and yes it is dhcp automatic
your original problem isn't in my buffer, if you could restate ...
try the usb port if you're connecting directly
well, you want what works, right?
people tried
if you insist on keeping use of enter for punctuation, could you speak in msg with the person helping you?
you can be connected to both
i lose internet if both are connected duno why
if the modem is new it could be busy updating its firmware, the web server is low priority, it might never load; but the modem is still working
what you did with your isp is pretty irrelevant
forget the modem page, just forget  it
none are relevant to anything, nor ubuntu relevant
